archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.12b: b) gathering additional data to understand the full context of the event (e.g. using threat intelligence) and establish whether the event(s) should be classified as a security incident
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
